Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 124th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1979...
Released by New York (N) on 4/26/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 6/9/1980 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/10/1981 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/3/1983 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/28/1984 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 4/1/1985 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 5/25/1985, off Pat Zachry (BOS)...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against New York (A) on 4/22/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1986, hitting .586 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1986, off Dick Ruthven (DET)...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/19/1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1988...
Injured on 8/4/1989 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Injured on 4/4/1990 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 6-7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (A) on 6/21/1990...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1990...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1991...
Injured on 4/4/1992 with a Fractured Knee, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Texas to Oakland on 7/7/1992 (Going to TEX: P S. Sparks. Going to OAK: C J. Stefero)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cleveland on 4/11/1993...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1993...
